allow: Bash(node -e "const s=require\(''sql.js''\);s\(\).then\(SQL=>{const fs=require\(''fs''\);const buf=fs.readFileSync\(''delivery-saas-backend/prisma/prisma/dev.db''\);const db=new SQL.Database\(buf\);const r=db.exec\(''SELECT id,address,customerName,orderType,payload FROM ""Order"" ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 3''\);console.log\(JSON.stringify\(r,null,2\)\)}\)")
